.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceProperties2-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_PROPERTIES_2
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceProperties2-pNext-pNext]] Each pname:pNext member of any structure (including this one) in the pname:pNext chain must: be either `NULL` or a pointer to a valid instance of slink:VkPhysicalDeviceIDProperties, slink:VkPhysicalDeviceMaintenance3Properties, slink:VkPhysicalDeviceMultiviewProperties, slink:VkPhysicalDevicePointClippingProperties, slink:VkPhysicalDeviceProtectedMemoryProperties, or slink:VkPhysicalDeviceSubgroupProperties
* [[VUID-VkPhysicalDeviceProperties2-sType-unique]] Each pname:sType member in the pname:pNext chain must: be unique
****
